protein.specific_function: Stimulates growth of the cells in an autocrine manner. Mediates hormonal action on the growth of cancer cells

reference.reference_text: Tanaka A, Miyamoto K, Matsuo H, Matsumoto K, Yoshida H: Human androgen-induced growth factor in prostate and breast cancer cells: its molecular cloning and growth properties. FEBS Lett. 1995 Apr 24;363(3):226-30.
